jobDescription: Job DescriptionHigh-End Home Goods Company in Corte Madera is seeking an organized Data Analyst to join their team.  The Data Analyst will compile payment data to develop meaningful reports that will determine business decisions. This position offers multiple opportunities to work with a wide range of internal departments, and offers excellent opportunity for growth. You will:Produce regular reports for Supply Chain, key performance indicators, and operational metricsAssess data sourcing processesReport on data to stakeholdersWork with stakeholders to improve on current billing processesTake on additional duties as neededYou will need:At least 2+ years of related experienceStrong attention to detail and accuracyExcellent organizational and time management skillsStrong interpersonal skills; ability to distill complex data into reportsAdvanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Access, and SQLWorking knowledge of MicroStrategy, Tableau, or similar a plus Please submit your resume to be considered for this opportunity to work with a leading company!  We will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.  Many employers request references even before the interview process begins. We recommend collecting your references now using the free website WorkGrades. apply for this job
